gnu.prolog.io
Class TermWriter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Writer
      java.io.PrintWriter
          gnu.prolog.io.TermWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, Appendable
public class TermWriter
extends PrintWriter

This class is intendent for printing terms.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Constantine A. Plotnikov.
